document.full_text: with labor confrontation looming this summer, the first week of the playoffs offered game 1 upsets, down-to-the-wire finishes and breathtaking performances from old and new stars.
document.title: on basketball: if n.b.a. is wise, thrills will stay nonstop
lines_and_colors: with labor confrontation looming this summer, the first week of the playoffs offered game 1 upsets, down-to-the-wire finishes and breathtaking performances from old and new stars.
